attributes.action: recognise he is unelected by the people and stand down from his stolen post as the head of our country, thus allowing democracy to decide.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown is NOT our prime minister.. he was NOT elected by the people .. He was in no way chosen by the people to decide what is best for England and it's citizens. Therefore he should step down from his post and allow democracy to take it's course.

At the moment Mr. Brown continues to batter on about democracy and it's value... and yet he is making a mockery of it every day he remains in office.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
